metadata.title: CVE-2016-5537 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in the NetBeans component in Oracle FusionMiddleware 8.1 allows local users to affect confidentiality, integrity, andavailability via unknown vectors. NOTE: the previous information is fromthe October 2016 CPU. Oracle has not commented on third-party claims thatthis issue is a directory traversal vulnerability which allows local userswith certain permissions to write to arbitrary files and consequently gainprivileges via a .. (dot dot) in a archive entry in a ZIP file imported asa project.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5537` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnb-absolutelayout-java - 10.0-3~18.04.1ubuntu1
libnb-apisupport3-java - 10.0-3~18.04.1ubuntu1
libnb-ide14-java - 10.0-3~18.04.1ubuntu1
libnb-java5-java - 10.0-3~18.04.1ubuntu1
netbeans - 10.0-3~18.04.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netbeans package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.0-3~18.04.1ubuntu1').
